Articles.Content: i have landed my second rocket on the minmus and i used the rover from carts mod, as i was landing i saw what i thought to were frozen lakes so i decided to use my mun rover, the minmus is made of chunks ( flat ones ) so when i switched chunks my rover fell through and my pod blew up as one chunk was higher than the other

This is not a 'How to' or a request for help. Locking this thread.

If you need to report a bug or issue, please do so in the development forum (and look for existing threads first!)
